Method.name: Upd
Method.Implementation:
NEW SQLCODE &sql(UPDATE Stc_Data.Training (IsFeedBackAutoMailing, IsCuratorAutoMailing) VALUES (0,0))
w !, "SQLCODE="_SQLCODE
&sql(DECLARE Tr2Cur CURSOR FOR SELECT ID FROM Stc_Data.Training)
&sql(OPEN Tr2Cur) for { &sql(FETCH Tr2Cur INTO :id) quit:(SQLCODE '= 0)
set training = ##class(Stc.Data.Training).%OpenId(id) set training.CuratorFullName = ##class(Stc.Data.Localization.LText).Create("") set training.CuratorEmail = "" set training.CuratorPhone = "" w training.%Save() } &sql(CLOSE Tr2Cur)
